p: Soil bulk samples and volume specific samples (100 cm 3) were collected at each site for laboratory experiments. The carbon content (TOC) varied considerably both within and across locations ( Fig. 3A) with the samples from Sandnes containing least organic C (8.5 ± 2.3% weight to dry weight) (mean ± SD; n = 10) and the samples from Qajaa the most (42 ± 12%) (mean ± SD; n = 7). The C/N relationship varied between 10 and 18 in all the samples ( Fig. 3B). The pyrite content was measured in selected samples and was <0.02% at Qajaa, 0.05–0.08% at Sandnes, 0.22% at Kangeq and 0.37% at Igaliku.
